Setup Auto Reload



1. Edit server properties you wish to set up
$> genserve edit autoreloadserver


2. Update the dynamicDirs section and add an index.html file to /path/to/public
{
    ...
    "monitorDirs": [
        "/path/to/public", "/path/to/build"
    ],
    ...
}


3. Start the server
$> genserve start hotreloadserver --port 10020 --dir ./public


4. Open your browser to http://localhost:10020/index.html
$> genserve start autoreloadserver


5. Modify the index.html file

The browser should reload the page.
